author: OneNutS
created_time: October 24, 2022, 08:15:24 AMLast edit: February 09, 2024, 08:17:56 AM by OneNutS
content: .RESSOURCES.     .SOCIALS.                  Shihtzu Exchange NFTs are unique digital assets created on the advance shihtzu blockchain network. They can be everything from gaming items and digital art, to sports collectibles and real-world assets. It will Bring your NFTs to life via a simple interface, send them through QR codes, and give them utility using tools that make it feel effortless. It will bring your trading skills and discover rare NFTs, from gaming items and digital art to collectibles from your favorite brands.  More details on the website:  https://shihtzu.exchange   ● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179 ● Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: October 24 - November 20  lasts for 4 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 6 weeks after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports every 3 days !● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 6 weeks after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the Coinsbit registration Email: ( https://coinsbit.io )● Join STZU on social media:- YouTube- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord● Perform tasks throughout the week! Tasks completed in one day-spam.●  You will receive 0 stakes for writing comments in TELEGRAM, TWITTER  OFFICIAL PAGES! You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign. ● Make reports in a separate post every 3 days. DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORT🙏!● Please, read the terms carefully. For non-compliance with requirements, you will not get stakes or be excluded from the bounty program. Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: Shihtzu Chat , Shihtzu Bounty, Aladdin Center●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- Coinsbit registration Email: ( https://coinsbit.io )- Bsc bep 20 address (personal wallet (Trustwallet)):- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:Bounty campaign reward pool:  32 200 300 000 STZU  tokens will be distributed through this bounty campaign. Rewards dislocation:● Video:  15%● Article: 15%● Twitter : 15%● Telegram: 15%● Facebook: 10%● Instagram: 10%● Discord: 10%● Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  ● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rules:  ● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179 ● Join STZU on social media:- YouTube- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● The video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company STZU● Please note, if the video has 0 views it will be rated at 0 stakes!● Content topics: Information can be used from social networks STZU and use hashtags: #STZU #SHIHTZU #SHIHTZUEXCHANGE #STZUARMY #STZUMEME #SHIHTZUMEMECOIN #MEMECOIN #sbone #STZUMETAVERSE #METAVERSE #STZUTOKEN● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  STZU Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:  1.  Join STZU on social media:- YouTube- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord3. Write a good video about STZU  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  Rewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes● High: 3 stakes● Good: 2 stakes● Average: 1 stakeYou can use social media for information: - YouTube- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- DiscordRules:● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179● Each participant can write 4 original  article only ( No more than 1 per week )● Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.● Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.● Participant's forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.● Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.● In the description of a Article, you have to write 70+ words of original text about the company https://shihtzu.exchange/ ● Content topics:Information can be used from social networks https://shihtzu.exchange/ and hashtags: #STZU #SHIHTZU #SHIHTZUEXCHANGE #STZUARMY #STZUMEME #SHIHTZUMEMECOIN #MEMECOIN #sbone #STZUMETAVERSE #METAVERSE #STZUTOKEN● Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  STZU Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1.  Join STZU on social media:- YouTube- Telegram - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- Discord2. Write a good article about https://shihtzu.exchange/ project3. Post it on your website, Medium, LinkedIn, Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, etc.:4. Submit it here:  Rewards:● Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake per one tweet or retweet /week ● Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stake per one tweet or retweet /week ● Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet /week● Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet /week● Have more than 10000 followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekRules:● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179 ● Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Twitter account● Participants have to make 1 new tweet and 1 retweet per day .● Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. ● Participants must use  #STZU #SHIHTZU #SHIHTZUEXCHANGE #STZUARMY #STZUMEME #SHIHTZUMEMECOIN #MEMECOIN #sbone #STZUMETAVERSE #METAVERSE #STZUTOKEN hashtags in every retweet and tweet.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  STZU Bounty, Aladdin Center● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread at the end of every week as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous week report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every 3 days using this format: Code:● Twitter Report ●- Day: XX - XX- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1....- Tweet Link#1....- Retweet Link #2....- Tweet Link#2....- Retweet Link #3....- Tweet Link#3....Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes (10 stakes/week)● 10 stakes once for wearing a "Your Name | Shihtzu” + LOGO.Rules:● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179 ● Join  - Telegram● Make a maximum 2 comments per 1 day● Write comments in different groups! Writing in the same groups - SPAM!● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the ShihtzuWrite comments on groups from this  listContinue the comment of the previous person. Your commentshould flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought. Comment examples:- Did you hear about the Shihtzu?- Is the Shihtzu good for buying now??- Is the Shihtzu powered by BSC or its own blockchain?- guys, what do you think about the Shihtzu?- Shihtzu looks good now, it's not pumped yet!           etc...● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  STZU Bounty, Aladdin Center● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | Shihtzu Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days  using this format::Code:[code] ● Telegram Report ●- Day XX - XX- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:.- Comment Link #6:Rewards:● 300 - 1000 Friends + Followers: 1 stake, per one post or repost or comment● 1001 - 3000 Friends + Followers: 2 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 3001 - 6000 Friends + Followers: 3 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 6001 - 12000 Friends + Followers: 4 stakes per one post or repost or comment● 12001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one post or repost or commentRules:● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179 ● Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Facebook account ● Make 1 posts and 1 repost per day.● Like a post when you make a share.● Post must contain text 70+ characters, and hashtag:  #STZU #SHIHTZU #SHIHTZUEXCHANGE #STZUARMY #STZUMEME #SHIHTZUMEMECOIN #MEMECOIN #sbone #STZUMETAVERSE #METAVERSE #STZUTOKEN● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  STZU Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days using this format  (work should be done each day):Code: ● Facebook Report ●Day: XX-XXFacebook Profile Link:- Share Link #1:- Custom Post Link #1:- Share Link #2:- Custom Post Link #2:- Share Link #3:- Custom Post Link #3:Rewards:●  300 to 1000 subscribers: 1 stake, per one post●  1000 to 5000 subscribers: 2 stakes, per one post●  5000-10000 subscribers: 3 stakes, per one post●  10001 subscribers: 4 stakes per one postRules:● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179 ● Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Instagram account ●  Copy 1 posts from the official page Instagram   per Day.●  Like all posts on the official page.●  Post must contain  hashtag:  #STZU #SHIHTZU #SHIHTZUEXCHANGE #STZUARMY #STZUMEME #SHIHTZUMEMECOIN #MEMECOIN #sbone #STZUMETAVERSE #METAVERSE #STZUTOKEN● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  STZU Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days using this format  (work should be done each day):Code: ● Instagram Report ●- Day:XX-XX- Instagram Profile link:- Custom Post Link #1:- Custom Post Link #2:- Custom Post Link #3:                            Rewards:● 10 stakes/week● You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per dayRules:● Mandatory rule!  To participate in the bounty campaign you must register in the https://shihtzu.exchange/register/12168179 ●  Must follow project Discord account● Write at least 10 constructive messages in this list: https://disboard.org/servers/tag/nft Posts/messages must be constructive and in a way that will not be considered spamming.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● DO NOT use hashtags !!! For using hashtags - 0 stakes!● You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per day● Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought.● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  STZU Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make weekly report in this thread using this format:Code:● Discord Report ●- Week:- Discord Profile link:- Discord comments:1: Link to Screenshot of Comment 2: Link to Screenshot of Comment 3: Link to Screenshot of Comment...etc.[/code]
